text: Heia tadau gau aamua gii noho i Jerusalem gi heia tegau deenei, gaa lawa gaa dugu ang gi tei dangada dela dono lodo tuadimee, e hanimoi i di laangi dela ga haganoho, dalia nia dagi mo digau hai gabunga o di waahale. Deenei di hai e hai, gei di hagawelewele o God gaa huli gi daha mo gidaadou.”
